title: Episode 206: The Unsolved Murders of the Jeff Davis 8 - Part 1
description:
A small town on a long stretch of highway in the bayou, its residents in the grips of poverty and addiction. When several women go missing and are found dead in a short span of time, their families want answers. But it seems like whoever is responsible for their murders has friends in high places. 

Click here to purchase tickets to our in-person live show and worldwide digital experience on Moment.

Please consider supporting the companies that support us!
